author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Eight! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Long-time industry legend in the historicals world VICTRIX  has relaesed their offer into Dark Ages skirmish combat. Joining the arena with such venerable titles as SAGA and later versions of HAIL CEASAR we've got the Viking Age laid out before us to play around in and kitbash the vast range of multi-part historical plastics Victrix sells. Let's dive in!

Check out the game available in digital and physical, as well as all the models HERE: https://www.victrixlimited.com/en-ca
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 028 - PILLAGE by VICTRIX
